milestoneName: Gap Analysis Report for OCP Test Scenarios

tasks.name: Review of existing OCP test scenarios to assess compatibility with updated workflows and tools
tasks.description: Analysis

tasks.name: Collaborate with OCP Team to identify gaps
tasks.description: Work with the OCP team to identify gaps inefficiencies and areas for improvement in the current test scenarios

tasks.name: Propose actionable solutions to identified gaps
tasks.description: Propose actionable solutions to address identified gaps including updates to workflows tools and test data requirements

tasks.name: Document the proposed solutions and their impact
tasks.description: Document the proposed solutions including their expected impact on test efficiency and effectiveness

milestoneName: PoC Simulation Proof of Concept (PoC) for Mobile One

tasks.name: Develop OCP Simulation PoC
tasks.description: Develop a proof of concept for OCP simulation tailored to Mobile One's requirements

tasks.name: Document Test Data Conditioning Process
tasks.description: Document the end-to-end process for test data conditioning including data preparation updates and validation

tasks.name: Automate Test Data Preparation
tasks.description: Automate test data preparation using TDM tools to streamline the simulation process

tasks.name: Validate OCP Simulation PoC
tasks.description: Validate the PoC by running a subset of Mobile One test cases and comparing results with expected outcomes

milestoneName: Mock Server Setup for Development Testing

tasks.name: Setup Development Mock Server
tasks.description: Setup and configure the mock server infrastructure for development testing

tasks.name: Validate Mock Server Integration
tasks.description: Validate the integration of the mock server with the development pipeline ensuring seamless execution of test cases

tasks.name: Document Mock Server Setup
tasks.description: Provide detailed documentation of the mock server setup process for future reference

milestoneName: Mobile One Testing Studio for Development (Mock-Based)

tasks.name: Configure Testing Studio for Mobile One
tasks.description: Configure Testing Studio to execute Mobile One test cases in the QA environment using mock servers

tasks.name: Automate Test Case Execution
tasks.description: Automate the execution of Mobile One test cases to improve efficiency and reduce manual intervention

milestoneName: Mobile One Testing Studio for Quality Assurance (Live Service)

tasks.name: Setup Live Service Environment
tasks.description: Setup and configure the testing environment to mirror the live service infrastructure

tasks.name: Create and Validate Test Data for QA
tasks.description: Create and validate test data for Mobile One test cases in the QA environment using live services

tasks.name: Execute QA Test Runs
tasks.description: Execute QA test runs for Mobile One test cases ensuring they meet quality standards and functional requirements

tasks.name: Deploy Mobile One Test Cases to Production
tasks.description: Deploy Mobile One test cases to production supported by detailed validation reports

milestoneName: Test Data Management and Inventory Tool

tasks.name: Develop Test Data Management Tool
tasks.description: Build a comprehensive tool to automate the creation conditioning and maintenance of test data for automated tests

tasks.name: Integrate TDM with Testing Framework
tasks.description: Integrate the Test Data Management tool with existing testing frameworks to enhance test data lifecycle management

tasks.name: Automate Test Data Preparation for Mobile One
tasks.description: Utilize TDM tools to automate test data preparation for Mobile One in the QA environment and execute dynamic test cases with live services

tasks.name: Automate Test Data Preparation for CAND
tasks.description: Utilize TDM tools to automate test data preparation for CAND in the QA environment and execute dynamic test cases with live services
